statements: SELECT * FROM subscription_tracking;
SELECT customer_id, subscription_type FROM subscription_tracking WHERE subscription_id = 1;
SELECT subscription_id, customer_id, renewal_date FROM subscription_tracking WHERE subscription_type = 'Premium Subscription';
SELECT * FROM subscription_tracking ORDER BY renewal_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(renewal_date) AS latest_renewal_date FROM subscription_tracking GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM subscription_tracking WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT subscription_id, customer_id, subscription_type FROM subscription_tracking WHERE subscription_type = 'Gold';
SELECT * FROM subscription_tracking WHERE subscription_type = 'Gold' ORDER BY renewal_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_subscriptions FROM subscription_tracking GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT subscription_id, upgrade_date FROM subscription_tracking WHERE upgrade_date IS NOT NULL AND renewal_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT renewal_id, subscription_id, renewal_date, amount FROM renewals WHERE renewal_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM upgrades WHERE subscription_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY upgrade_date DESC;
SELECT renewal_id, subscription_id, amount FROM renewals WHERE amount >= 100.00;
SELECT upgrade_id, subscription_id, upgraded_plan FROM upgrades WHERE upgraded_plan = 'Premium';
SELECT * FROM renewals WHERE subscription_id = '876e1234-a87b-45c3-b456-321614174111';
SELECT * FROM renewals WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY renewal_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT renewal_id, subscription_id, renewal_date FROM renewals WHERE subscription_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM upgrades WHERE upgrade_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY upgrade_date ASC;

SELECT * FROM renewals r INNER JOIN upgrades u ON r.subscription_id = u.subscription_id WHERE r.amount >= 500 AND u.upgraded_plan = 'Premium' ORDER BY r.renewal_date ASC, u.upgrade_date DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT r.renewal_id, r.renewal_date, u.upgrade_date, u.upgraded_plan FROM renewals r LEFT JOIN upgrades u ON r.subscription_id = u.subscription_id WHERE r.amount < 100 OR u.upgraded_plan IS NULL ORDER BY r.renewal_date DESC, u.upgrade_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM renewals;
SELECT subscription_id, renewal_date FROM renewals WHERE subscription_id = 'ABCDE12345';
SELECT subscription_id, renewal_date FROM renewals ORDER BY renewal_date DESC;
SELECT subscription_id, renewal_date FROM renewals WHERE renewal_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT subscription_id, renewal_date FROM renewals WHERE renewal_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY renewal_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM subscriptions WHERE status='active' ORDER BY subscription_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT subscription_id, customer_id, plan FROM subscriptions WHERE plan='premium' ORDER BY subscription_date ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT s.subscription_id, s.customer_id, u.upgrade_date, u.new_plan FROM subscriptions s JOIN upgrades u ON s.subscription_id = u.subscription_id WHERE u.new_plan='gold' ORDER BY u.upgrade_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT r.subscription_id, s.customer_id, r.renewal_date FROM renewals r JOIN subscriptions s ON r.subscription_id = s.subscription_id ORDER BY r.renewal_date ASC LIMIT 7;

SELECT s.subscription_id, s.customer_id, s.plan, r.renewal_date FROM subscriptions s LEFT JOIN renewals r ON s.subscription_id = r.subscription_id WHERE r.renewal_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY r.renewal_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Subscriptions;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers;
SELECT renewal_id, subscription_id, renewal_date, renewal_amount FROM Renewals WHERE renewal_amount > 100;
SELECT subscription_id, plan FROM Subscriptions WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(subscription_id) AS total_subscriptions FROM Subscriptions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Renewals ORDER BY renewal_id DESC;
SELECT subscription_id, renewal_date, renewal_amount FROM Renewals WHERE renewal_amount > 1000;
SELECT subscription_id, start_date, end_date FROM Subscriptions WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT new_plan, upgrade_date, previous_plan FROM Upgrades ORDER BY upgrade_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT id, customer_id, plan FROM subscriptions ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM plans WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE id = 3;
SELECT DISTINCT new_plan FROM upgrades;
SELECT id, renewal_date, amount FROM renewals WHERE amount <= 100.00 ORDER BY renewal_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM renewals WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY renewal_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM subscriptions WHERE plan = 'Premium' AND end_date > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY start_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, email FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'J%' AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT upgrade_date, new_plan FROM upgrades WHERE previous_plan = 'Basic' ORDER BY upgrade_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, name, price FROM plans WHERE price < 50.00 ORDER BY name ASC LIMIT 5;
